  The CMAKE_Kotlin_COMPILER:

    /Users/gauthier/.konan/kotlin-native-macos-0.4-dev-102/bin/konanc

  is not a full path to an existing compiler tool.

  Tell CMake where to find the compiler by setting either the environment
  variable "KOTLIN_COMPILER" or the CMake cache entry CMAKE_Kotlin_COMPILER
  to the full path to the compiler, or to the compiler name if it is in the
